description:
My place is just a few avenues away from Central Park! You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the comfy bed, restaurants, and the natural sunlight! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Huge living room with lots of lounging space. Big screen tv mounted on wall!

Our neighborhood has lots of restaurants close by. We are just a few avenues from central park.
name: Cozy Upper East Side apartment!!
review: Was a really great space for a weekend stay! Brittany really worked well to help us out and was very easy to work with! Would recommend this place and would definitely come back!
